patterns: where is the login page of davpkt
where is the login page of DAV Public School, Pokhariput
where is the login page of DAV Pokhariput
responses:
first, open the DAV Pokhariput site,which is http://davpkt.org.in/ 
 Then, see the menu bar, and click 'login'.
 you will see 2 options, 'staff-login', and 'online fee payment(which is typically student login).
 for staff login, click on 'staff login(http://117.247.73.56/Login.aspx)' and for student login, click on 'online fee payment(https://davpkt.ivyeduerp.com/studentlogin.aspx)'

patterns: gallery of DAV Pblic school, Pokhariput
where is the gallery of DAV Pblic school, Pokhariput
responses:
you can find the gallery by: 
 first, go to homepage of DAV PKT Website. 
 next, you will see the button named'photo gallery'
 if not, then go to homepage >> homes >> gallery
 or you can just click on the link here which will redirect you to the page:
 'http://davpkt.org.in/Full/Photo/all'
